name: Research Guitar Types and Styles
description: Explore different types of guitars (acoustic, electric, classical) and playing styles to decide which best suits your interests.

name: Set Up Practice Space
description: Arrange a dedicated and comfortable space for practicing, ensuring good lighting, a suitable chair, and a music stand (if applicable).

name: Establish a Consistent Practice Routine
description: Set up a regular schedule for guitar practice to ensure continuous improvement and make playing a habit.

name: Practice the Chosen Song (Hands Separate)
description: Diligently practice the chosen song, focusing on playing each hand's part accurately and independently.

name: Learn Basic Guitar Fundamentals
description: Understand how to properly hold the guitar, fret notes, and perform basic strumming techniques.

name: Master Basic Finger Exercises & Posture
description: Learn and practice correct sitting posture, hand position, and fundamental finger exercises to develop strength and independence.

name: Practice Regular Strumming and Fingerpicking Patterns
description: Develop rhythm and dexterity by practicing various strumming patterns and simple fingerpicking exercises.

name: Choose a Simple Beginner Song
description: Select a very simple song (e.g., "Mary Had a Little Lamb," "Hot Cross Buns") that is appropriate for a beginner to learn.

name: Find Learning Resources
description: Identify and choose your primary learning resources, such as online tutorials, beginner books, or a local guitar instructor.

name: Successfully Play the Chosen Song
description: Perform the chosen song from beginning to end, demonstrating reasonable accuracy, rhythm, and musicality.

name: Learn Your First Simple Song
description: Apply your learned chords and strumming patterns to play a complete, simple song from start to finish.

name: Acquire a Piano/Keyboard
description: Obtain a working piano or digital keyboard, either by purchasing, borrowing, or renting one.

name: Learn Basic Music Theory & Instrument Layout
description: Familiarize yourself with the names of the white and black keys, basic note values (whole, half, quarter notes), and simple time signatures.

name: Practice the Chosen Song (Hands Together)
description: Combine both hands and practice playing the chosen song, synchronizing the movements and maintaining a steady tempo.

name: Acquire a Guitar and Essential Gear
description: Purchase or borrow a guitar along with necessary accessories such as picks, a tuner, a strap, and an amplifier (if electric).

name: Learn Major Scales (C, G, D)
description: Practice playing the C, G, and D major scales accurately with both hands, focusing on smooth transitions and even rhythm.

name: Learn Basic Chords (C, G, F)
description: Learn to form and play the C major, G major, and F major chords correctly with your left hand, and practice transitioning between them.

name: Master Basic Chords and Scales
description: Learn and practice common open chords (e.g., G, C, D, E, A, Em, Am) and a simple major or minor scale.
